name: emigatron
description: Create free encrypted room for chating. Do not delete messages, just update a token.

scripts.install: npm install && cd server && cd client && npm install
scripts.ssl: cd server && cd ssl && node ssl.js
scripts.bot: cd server && cd bot && nodemon start-bot.js
scripts.client: cd server && cd client && npm run start
scripts.build: cd server && cd client && npm run build
scripts.server: cd server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production nodemon server.js
scripts.prod: npm run build &&  npm run ssl && concurrently "npm run bot" "npm run server"
